item.title: Sen. Blackburn to Newsmax: Trump Displayed 'Master Class in Foreign Diplomacy'
item.description: President Donald Trump carried out a master class in dealing with the Iran-Israel war, Sen. Marsha Blackburn. R-Tenn., told Newsmax on Tuesday.
